The book every Tinker needs
by Skyla

to convert it into Mending Moss.

item.tconstruct.creative_upgrade.tooltip: Adds an additional upgrade slot to a tool
item.tconstruct.creative_ability.tooltip: Adds an additional ability slot to a tool
item.tconstruct.copper_can.tooltip: Stackable container holding 1 ingot of fluid
item.tconstruct.broad_axe_head_red_sand_: Broad Axe Head Red Sand Cast
item.tconstruct.large_sword_blade_red_sa: Large Sword Blade Red Sand Cast

insert into the block below
block.tconstruct.wooden_hopper.tooltip: Slower, cheaper variant of the hopper
item.tconstruct.quartz_shuriken.tooltip: A throwable weapon with higher damage
item.tconstruct.flint_shuriken.tooltip: A throwable weapon with high knockback
item.tconstruct.slime_sling.tooltip:
Charge up, aim low, get flinging!
Use Slime Boots if you value your life!
item.tconstruct.piggy_backpack.tooltip: Right-click mobs to pick them up
item.tconstruct.soggy_spaghetti.tooltip:
Now they're all wet, even your spaghetti arms can bend them now.
Let's hang them up and get them dry.
item.tconstruct.cold_spaghetti.tooltip:
Well, that's better, but they still taste gross.
Warming them up should make them edible.
They might even be good enough to get you off your weak knees.
block.tconstruct.part_chest.tooltip: Can hold a large amount of toolparts
item.tconstruct.pickaxe.description:
The Pickaxe is a precise mining tool. It is effective on stone and ores.
It breaks blocks, OK?
item.tconstruct.hammer.description:
The Hammer is a broad mining tool. It harvests blocks in a wide range.
Also effective against undead.
item.tconstruct.mattock.description:
The Cutter Mattock is a versatile farming tool. It is effective on wood, dirt, sand, gravel, and plants.
Just don't dig your own grave!
item.tconstruct.excavator.description:
The Excavator is a broad digging tool. It digs up large areas of soil and snow in a wide range.
Terraforming!
item.tconstruct.axe.description:
The Hand Axe chops up wood and makes short work of leaves. It also makes for an effective weapon.
Chop chop!
item.tconstruct.kama.description:
The Kama is a precision reaping tool, mowing down plants and shearing animals.
Right Click: Harvest and replant crops
item.tconstruct.broad_sword.description:
The Broadsword is a universal weapon. Sweep attacks keep enemy hordes at bay.
Also good against cobwebs!
block.tconstruct.seared_stone.tooltip: Part of the Smeltery. Safe for decoration.
block.tconstruct.seared_cobble.tooltip: Part of the Smeltery. Safe for decoration.
block.tconstruct.seared_bricks.tooltip: Part of the Smeltery. Safe for decoration.
block.tconstruct.seared_paver.tooltip: Part of the Smeltery. Safe for decoration.

Part of the Smeltery. Safe for decoration.

Part of the Smeltery. Safe for decoration.
Cannot store liquids.
block.tconstruct.seared_glass_pane.toolt: Cannot be used in a Smeltery.
block.tconstruct.seared_ladder.tooltip: Climbable Smeltery block. Safe for decoration.
block.tconstruct.seared_tank.tooltip:
Heart of the Smeltery.
Retains liquid when broken.
block.tconstruct.seared_gauge.tooltip:
Ideal for metals, holding 3 molten blocks.
Retains liquid when broken.
block.tconstruct.seared_window.tooltip:
Alternate Smeltery tank.
Retains liquid when broken.
block.tconstruct.faucet.tooltip: Drains liquids from Smelteries and Tanks
block.tconstruct.casting_basin.tooltip: Cast items using molten metals from a Smeltery
block.tconstruct.casting_table.tooltip: Cast items using molten metals from a Smeltery
block.tconstruct.channel.tooltip: Distributes fluids poured from a faucet above.
block.tconstruct.melter.tooltip:
First Smeltery.
Place above a seared tank or heater to fuel.
block.tconstruct.seared_heater.tooltip: Solid fuel source for the Melter.
death.attack.tconstruct.smeltery_magic: %1$s has become one with the smeltery
block.tconstruct.seared_duct.tooltip: Filtered smeltery fluid input and output using copper cans or buckets
gui.tconstruct.melting.no_heat: Not enough heat to melt this item.
gui.tconstruct.melting.no_space: Not enough free space for the fluid.
block.tconstruct.slime_dirt.tooltip: Slimy, but lets you jump higher
block.tconstruct.slime_grass.tooltip: So soft! Lets you jump higher
modifier.tconstruct.empty.description: Fallback for when a modifier is missing
modifier.tconstruct.creative_ability.des: Tool sits on unearned extra ability slots
modifier.tconstruct.reinforced.descripti: Tool is less likely to take damage
modifier.tconstruct.experienced.descript: Gain bonus XP from killing mobs and mining blocks
modifier.tconstruct.knockback.descriptio: Hitting things makes them go flying further!
modifier.tconstruct.emerald.description: Increases durability depending on base durability!
modifier.tconstruct.silky.description: Mined blocks drop themselves instead of the usual items
modifier.tconstruct.worldbound.descripti: A crude version of netherite, granting immunity to external damage like fire, but no additional strength
modifier.tconstruct.netherite.descriptio: Harness the power of ancient metal, making the tool stronger and immune to external damage such as fire
modifier.tconstruct.expanded.description: Tool's area of effect is larger than before
modifier.tconstruct.overslime.descriptio: Tool consumes overslime instead of durability, until it runs out! Not friendly towards tools lacking slime
modifier.tconstruct.writable.description: More words. More upgrade. It's only logical!
modifier.tconstruct.harmonious.descripti: Allows an additional upgrade to live in harmony with the rest!
modifier.tconstruct.recapitated.descript: Sets this tool ahead by one upgrade!
modifier.tconstruct.cultivated.descripti: Tool practically grows more material when repairing
modifier.tconstruct.jagged.description: Every point durability lost increases damage, but decreases mining speed
modifier.tconstruct.stonebound.descripti: The tool mines faster as it wears out, but does less damage
modifier.tconstruct.fractured.descriptio: Tool is extra sharp due to the broken bits of bone
modifier.tconstruct.searing.description: Tool does bonus fire damage in hot areas, but less overall damage in cold ones
modifier.tconstruct.dwarfish.description: Tool mines faster the deeper you mine, just don't mine too deep
modifier.tconstruct.enhanced.description: Rose gold goes great with a bonus upgrade!
modifier.tconstruct.overcast.description: Damage has a chance to bounce off of overslime on tool
modifier.tconstruct.lacerating.descripti: Causes the target to bleed, dealing additional damage
modifier.tconstruct.maintained.descripti: Tool mines faster when at higher durability
modifier.tconstruct.lightweight.descript: Tool is incredibly light for its size, allowing faster attacking and mining
modifier.tconstruct.tasty.description: Smells so good, you cannot resist taking a few bites of your tool
death.attack.tconstruct.bleed.item: %1$s bled to death from injuries caused by %2$s
modifier.tconstruct.overlord.description: Tool rules over a greater amount of overslime
modifier.tconstruct.momentum.flavor: Not Fast Enough, Gotta Go Faster!
modifier.tconstruct.momentum.description: Mining blocks increases your speed, as long as you keep going
modifier.tconstruct.insatiable.descripti: During combat you deal more and more damage every time you hit an enemy
modifier.tconstruct.heavy.description: Hard to move while wielding, but it packs a heavy punch
modifier.tconstruct.smite.description: Let the undead fall to the might of your blade
modifier.tconstruct.sturdy.description: Made from the longest lasting steel
modifier.tconstruct.maintained_2.descrip: Tool mines faster when at higher durability
modifier.tconstruct.temperate.descriptio: Tool mines faster when in extreme temperatures
stat.tconstruct.attack_speed.description:
Base value for attack speed calculations.
Roughly full strength attacks per second.
stat.tconstruct.head: Head
stat.tconstruct.head.durability.descript:
The base-value for durability calculations.
Usually an integral part to the overall durability of a tool.
stat.tconstruct.head.mining_speed.descri:
How fast a tool with a tool head of this material can mine blocks.
May be influenced by other toolparts.
stat.tconstruct.head.harvest_level.descr: What range of blocks a tool with a tool head of this material can mine.
stat.tconstruct.head.attack.description:
Base value for attack calculations.
The end result depends on the tool itself and the other components used.
stat.tconstruct.handle.durability.descri: The total durability of the tool will be multiplied by this.
stat.tconstruct.handle.attack_damage.des: The total attack damage of the tool will be multiplied by this.
stat.tconstruct.handle.attack_speed.desc: The total attack speed of the tool will be multiplied by this.
stat.tconstruct.handle.mining_speed.desc: The total mining speed of the tool will be multiplied by this.
tooltip.part.missing_stats:
Material is missing the required stats:
{0}
gui.tconstruct.part_builder.info:
Here you can craft tool parts to fulfill your tinkering fantasies.

To craft a part simply put a blank pattern into the left slot and select the part you want. The remaining slot holds the material you want to craft your part out of.
gui.tconstruct.tinker_station.info: The main way to repair or change your tools. Place a tool and a material on the left to get started.
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.not_enough_up: Need at least %s upgrade slots to add this modifier
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.not_enough_ab: Need at least %s ability slots to add this modifier
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.requirements_: Tool state invalid for one of the modifiers. Contact your modpack maker and request a more descriptive error.
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.netherite_req: Netherite requires either diamond or emerald to be applied
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.ender_expande: Must apply the magma expander first
gui.tconstruct.caption: Caption
gui.tconstruct.general.hover: Hover over the entries for more information
gui.tconstruct.error.invalid_pattern: Pattern does not contain a valid tool part!
gui.tconstruct.error.useless_tool_part:
This part can not be used to craft any tool!

Either the material %s is missing some information or no tool uses a(n) %s in its crafting.
gui.tconstruct.error.not_enough_durabili:
Not enough durability to replace parts!
%d more durability required.

jei.tconstruct.casting.cast_consumed: Cast item is consumed on casting

jei.tconstruct.modifiers.abilities: Modifier requires %s ability slots to apply
jei.tconstruct.modifiers.upgrade: Modifier requires 1 upgrade slot to apply
jei.tconstruct.modifiers.upgrades: Modifier requires %s upgrade slots to apply
